meanings.definition: A person who trusts or has confidence in someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The truster believed in his friend's honesty.
meanings.sent2: She is a truster who always sees the best in people.
meanings.sent3: The truster thought the talking dog was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a truster, always open to new friendships.
meanings.sent5: The truster's faith in humanity never wavered.

meanings.definition: One who places trust or confidence in someone or something.
meanings.sent1: As a truster, he relied on his intuition to guide him.
meanings.sent2: The truster had faith that everything would work out in the end.
meanings.sent3: The truster's lucky charm was a rubber duck.
meanings.sent4: Her truster in the universe's plan never faltered.
meanings.sent5: The truster's optimism was contagious to those around her.
